channel.title: GameMode Idea (Prison)
channel.description:
# Prison ### Gamemode requires 13 players minimum, 16 maximum. ### All players will be either [color=orange]Prisoner[/color] or [color=blue]Guard[/color].
### The Guards will have the goal of keeping the Prisoners contained until day 7. The Prisoners need majority before then. ### The Warden will know everyone's alignment.
The starting Warden is a guaranteed Guard. They will know every players alignment, however no one will know who the Warden is. If the Warden is killed, all players will privately vote for another one.

All players will be either Prisoner or Guard.

The Guards will have the goal of keeping the Prisoners contained until day 7. The Prisoners need majority before then.

The Warden will know everyone’s alignment.

The starting Warden is a guaranteed Guard. They will know every players alignment, however no one will know who the Warden is. If the Warden is killed, all players will privately vote for another one.
